text: Jules Shungu Wembadio Pene Kikumba, or commonly known as Papa Wemba (June 14, 1949 - April 24, 2016) was a Congolese rumba (later known as soukous) singer and musician. He was one of Africa's most popular musicians, and known in world music. He was born in Lubefu, Sankuru District, Belgian Congo. He worked with Zaiko Langa Langa and Viva la Musica. Wemba, who suffered from epilepsy, died after suffering a seizure on stage in Abidjan, CÃ´te d'Ivoire on April 24, 2016 at the age of 66.Papa Wemba: Congo music star dies after collapsing on stage ==References== ==Other websites== * Papa Wemba Official Web Site * * Biography of Papa Wemba, Soukous Radio Category:1949 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from epilepsy Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo people Category:Singers Category:Musicians
title: Papa Wemba
